description: To celebrate the New Year, I decided to bring back members' favorite sexy bodybuilder Brad. 18 pounds of muscles heavier, Brad showed up with all the craziness he's known for. Shootings are always a big party with him and this time was no exception. For this occasion, I asked his fans some questions and requests, some that even made him felt uncomfortable. Join the party and learn more about Brad in this very special scene. Happy New Year everyone!
title: Brad, Bigger He Cums, Scene #01
